coded_answer.p: It was such a pleasure to receive your letter, and we will be extremely glad to see you at the conference, we have been organising. Let me give you some further information concerning the event.

Firstly I would like to inform you about the hotel we have already booked for you. IsIt is called the Palace Hotel, and we hope that it is going to satisfymeet your expectetionsexpectations. The conference is not too far from your hotel. I strongly reccommendrecommend you to use the public transportationtransport in order to get there, causebecause you may be find other types of transportation quite expensive.

Moreover, you must be aware of the fact that the conference is going to last two hours, untilluntil 10:00 pm. After that our college has organised a barbequioubarbecue night, with traditional local music that you must not miss. You don't need to wear formal clothes. Just, just every dayeveryday clothes.

Finally, I am aware of the fact that on the last day you have some hours free before you catch your plane. Don't miss the chance to visit our famous tourist attractions. There is also a huge shop centreshopping centre, where you can buy some souvenirs or taste some of our traditional food.
I hope that you will find my information helpfullhelpful.
I'amI am looking forward to seeing you.

Welcome to Athens!! Without any doubt, it is a hystoricalhistorical place which provides it'sits visitors with the opportunity to discover different aspects of the greekGreek history during the passing of the centuries.

Don't miss the chance to visit the hystoricalhistorical museum, located in the heart of the capital city. A traditional building which was built at the beginning of the century. The, the hystoricalhistorical museum is simply a symbol, a proof of what the greekGreekGreeks have always considered as a mainfundamental principalprinciple: their freedom. There are five diffrentdifferent floors, each of them presents a diffrentdifferent chronicalchronological period of greekGreek history, starting from the period before the birth of JuisusJesus and concluding towith the revolution of 1967. The museum provides the visitor with the opportunity to see original pieces of writing, famous paintings having as their main subject the revolution of 1821, and aspects of the greekGreek religion that hashave always been considered to be a vital part of greekGreek history. There is a small amount of money that visitors should pay for entryentry fee. Inside the museum there is a bookshop havingwith a large variety of hystoricalhistorical books, maps etc.
If you really want to discover what greekGreek history means, we strongly recommend you to visit the hystoricalhistorical museum!!!
